title: Narrow plots in industrial zones, viz
clause_text: Narrow plots in industrial zones, viz. those having one dimension smaller than 16 m will be allowed the relaxation subject to the restrictions in Table No 20 hereunder. Open Space Relaxation in Narrow Plots in Industrial Zones

source_pdf.text_snippet: Narrow plots in industrial zones, viz. those having one dimension smaller than 16 m will be allowed the relaxation subject to the restrictions in Table No 20 hereunder.
